qas.question: On what day and month was Spectre released to the Chinese market?
How much more money did Spectre make during its first weekend in China than Skyfall?
By the weekend after its China release, how much had revenue decreased?
How much had Spectre made in its first month in China?
Spectre came in second in opening day gross in China behind what movie?
How much money did Spectre gross after four weekends in China?
The film opened on 11 of what month in China?
The film occupied 53% of all screens in what country?
The film took in $890,000 in advance night screenings in what country?
The film fell by 85% in its second weekend in what country?

context: In <b7_0><b8_0><b9_0>China<b9_0/><b8_0/><b7_0/>, it opened on <a0_0>12 <b6_0>November<b6_0/><a0_0/> and earned $15 million on its opening day, which is the second biggest 2D single day gross for a Hollywood film behind the $18.5 million opening day of <a4_0>Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation<a4_0/> and occupying 43% of all available screens which included $790,000 in advance night screenings. Through its opening weekend, it earned $48.1 million from 14,700 screens which is <a1_0>198%<a1_0/> ahead of Skyfall, a new record for a Hollywood 2D opening. IMAX contributed $4.6 million on 246 screens, also a new record for a three-day opening for a November release (breaking Interstellar's record). In its second weekend, it added $12.1 million falling precipitously by <a2_0>75%<a2_0/> which is the second worst second weekend drop for any major Hollywood release in China of 2015. It grossed a total of <a3_0><a5_0>$84.7 million<a5_0/><a3_0/> there after four weekends. Albeit a strong opening it failed to attain the $100 million mark as projected.
